about_the_game:
Basic Description

  • Standing Together is a top-down shooting co-op roguelite game that killing constantly increased zombies to suppress the area overrun. Acquired equipments and items are permanently saved in backpack and keep use it in next game. Can play in singleplayer, or multiplayer with up to 4 people.

  • Unlike backpack permanently saved, Skill-tree and talent are randomly changed on every game for new strategy play.

Game Features

  • You will be dispatched to the area to fight against zombies for days so that keep zombies count doesn't over than certain number. In day, the zombies are not increased, and don't attack, but it changed to night, every zombie in area will find you for kill. When last day has end, you can escape from area.

  • The supplies and items are placed in all over the area. Let's find some goods during day when zombies are quiet.

  • Kill the zombies before area has overran. Melee, pistol, rifle, shotgun and grenade etc, you can purify the zombies with various weapons and items.

  • During night, sometimes troublesome zombie will appear. But show them they just powerless in front of the bullet hell.

  • Each day past, zombies getting stronger. But you can be much stronger than them. Kill the zombies to get the experience and unlock the skills and shared perks.

  • The perks will fully shared you and your crews. Choose it smartly.

  • Somtime, it is a good strategy that set up the barricade and fight inside instead of walkaround somewhere. You don't worry even barricade is broke. There is a way out in there.

  • Required ingredients of barricade set up has placed all over the area, or you can acquire from zombies.

  • All acquired items are stored into backpack and saved permanently. You can use the items that acquired before to the next game. But it applied only if you have survived and escape the area.

  • When use the weapon, it reduces the durability, and can be broken so that can't use anymore. You have to prepare more weapons. The broken weapon will be repaired in next game.

Additional Game Info

  • There are 6 types of zombies in current version.

  • You can choose the perk deck before game start.

  • The backpack will not be changed if you are dead or leave the game.

  • You can escape the area when last day has end.

  • The weapon's durability will be repaired on next game. (Only in demo)

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes blood effects, decal, body separation and gore sounds.

detailed_description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

  • The game is currently in development. Add game to wishlist and join discord to check out the development progress!

  • Multiplayer is still in development, and Singleplayer demo version will launching soon.

name: Standing Together

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The world has fallen by zombies. As a part of the association, you are dispatched to the places where zombies are concentrated and stabilize these areas. Fill your backpack with the full of items, and eliminate zombies with the bullet hell.
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Polish
